name: Design Meeting Preparation // Checklist of questions to make sure you are ready
description:
👏🏽To be a good UX designer

...it is not enough to solve problems by following UX principles, having a solid process, user testing and checking data. You have to also be able to articulate your solutions.


😿Unfortunately the best idea doesn’t always win

...many times its the more compelling idea that gets implemented. There is no point in having a good solution if you can’t explain to your stakeholders WHY you did what you did.


✅ Use these questions

...as a checklist to make sure you are prepared for design reviews/presentations.


💪You can

...write them down in your figma file or just answer them to yourself, so when you are challenged in meetings you are not flustered but prepared.
